org.monetdb.monetdbe

Class MonetTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.monetdb.monetdbe.MonetTypes

  • public class MonetTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to convert between MonetDBe types, JDBC SQL types and Java classes.

    • Field Summary

      • getMonetTypeFromSQL

        protected static int getMonetTypeFromSQL(int sqltype)
        Conversion between SQL types (int) and MonetDBe types (int). DECIMAL and NUMERIC types are returned as MonetDBe type 4, but the MonetDBe type for DECIMAL can vary.
        Parameters:
        sqltype - SQL type (int) to convert
        Returns:
        MonetDBe type (int)
